title: Wagerup weekend
brief_description: Examines the campaign by environmentalists to stop the construction of an Alcoa aluminium smelter at Wagerup (near Perth, WA). Looks at the reasons behind the conservation movement and shows the nature of non-violent civil disobedience and its consequences. Highlights the difficulties facing protest groups in Western Australia and the importance of the Courts in their struggle. Suitable for secondary level.
